definition: Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: So saying sodium bicarbonate julep is in fact not true.
sentences.chinese: 所以說小蘇打去黑頭的說法其實不現實。

sentences.english: On this organisgotd with the sea! the pandas like to drink tea with pelike in soda.
sentences.chinese: 在海里的這個區域，熊貓們喜歡就着蘇打碗豆喝茶。

sentences.english: Drink fewer sodas and other sweetened drinks, like iced tea.
sentences.chinese: 少喝蘇打汽水和其他甜飲料，比如冰茶。

sentences.english: One whisky soda, no ice, coming up immediately.
sentences.chinese: 一杯威士忌蘇打，不放冰的，馬上來。

sentences.english: Percy: We better get some seltzer on that.
sentences.chinese: 我們去拿些蘇打水清洗下吧。

sentences.english: To the hot water, add about one cup of baking soda for each gallon of water.
sentences.chinese: 在熱水中加入量爲每加侖水一茶杯的小蘇打。

sentences.english: Remove from heat and stir in the flour, baking soda, and almonds until well mixed.
sentences.chinese: 離火拌入麪粉，蘇打粉，還有杏仁片，混合均勻。

sentences.english: The machine used to sell soda water.
sentences.chinese: 這個機器以前是出售蘇打水的。

sentences.english: Fill in nail holes in drywall with  toothpaste and baking soda.
sentences.chinese: 牙膏與小蘇打混合可以用來填補牆面的釘子洞。

sentences.english: Gargle baking soda water to help with ulcers.
sentences.chinese: 用小蘇打水來漱口可以預防潰瘍。

sentences.english: Wash your  garbage cans with baking soda.
sentences.chinese: 可用小蘇打清洗你的垃圾罐。

sentences.english: Try cutting your intake by replacing caffeinated sodas and coffee with non-caffeinated drinks.
sentences.chinese: 試着少飲用含咖啡因的蘇打水和咖啡飲料。

sentences.english: Shake recipe with ice , strain over fresh ice and top with soda water.
sentences.chinese: 加冰搖合所有原料，濾入冰塊，注入適量蘇打水。

sentences.english: The soda made the goddess nod by the fishing rod.
sentences.chinese: 蘇打使女神在釣竿旁打盹英語口語人機對話。

sentences.english: We also have great salad as well as soda and iced tea.
sentences.chinese: 我們還供應一流的沙拉，蘇打水和冰茶。

sentences.english: Clean corroded battery terminals with baking soda and water.
sentences.chinese: 小蘇打水可以清洗腐蝕電池的兩端。

definition: Yakult (Japanese brand of fermented milk drink)
(of alcohol) to go to one's head/(old) (of a bride-to-be) to bind one's hair into a bun/(of a prostitute) to receive a patron for the first time
above/on top of/on the surface of
